title: Karma Drawing Help!!!
body:
Hi was working on drawing Sun Goddess Karma, but then I realized I don't know what color her eyes are... So are her eyes green or blue? 
I'll include a picture of my WIP. The whole reason I started to draw this picture was to send it to Riot asking them to donate like 30 RP for the Sun Goddess skin, then I discovered I was 243 points short, so...................... oh well. I'm going to finish the picture any way, as soon as I get her eye color.

replies.body: thank you! Ive made a ton of improvements since posting this. However, I just thought of a great idea for an ori fan art, so I gotta work on sketching that out before I forget the concept.
From the splash art, it looks like teal to me, actually! Maybe even sea green.
Thank you, i think I make them like a teal-ish blue.

Wait for the sales.

And about her eye color, I think only Riot can tell if its not visible on her splash
